Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photos show construction projects in the Philippines when they actually depict projects in New York, Peru, Glasgow, and Los Angeles.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up its assertion that the photos are from construction projects in the Philippines.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that all the photos in the post are related to construction projects in the Philippines, when in reality, only one of the photos is related to a project in the country.
Exist alternative explanation: The existence of alternative explanations is evident in the fact that the photos have been sourced to projects in different locations, indicating that they are not all from the Philippines.
